"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey: This song is all about keeping the faith and believing in yourself, even when things seem difficult or impossible. It's a great song to listen to when you need a boost of motivation and inspiration.

"Happy" by Pharrell Williams: This upbeat and catchy song is all about finding joy and happiness in life, no matter what. It's a great reminder to focus on the positive and find happiness in the small things.

"I Lived" by OneRepublic: This song is a powerful ballad about living life to the fullest and making the most of every moment. It's a great song to listen to when you're feeling grateful for the experiences you've had and the people in your life.

"Roar" by Katy Perry: This empowering song is all about standing up for yourself and being strong in the face of adversity. It's a great song to listen to when you need a boost of confidence and self-belief.

"The Sound of Silence" by Simon & Garfunkel: This classic song is a beautiful reflection on the power of silence and introspection. It's a great song to listen to when you need some quiet time to reflect on your thoughts and emotions.
